code: export const formatDate=dateString=>{return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US',{year:'numeric',month:'short',day:'numeric'});};export const formatTime=dateString=>{return new Date(dateString).toLocaleTimeString('en-US',{hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'});};export const isToday=dateString=>{const today=new Date();const date=new Date(dateString);return date.toDateString()===today.toDateString();};export const isYesterday=dateString=>{const yesterday=new Date();yesterday.setDate(yesterday.getDate()-1);const date=new Date(dateString);return date.toDateString()===yesterday.toDateString();};
